import React, { useState } from 'react'; function OverrideData(props) { const [sensorDate, setSensorDate] = useState('') const [sensorTime, setSensorTime] = useState('') const [sensorPH, setSensorPH] = useState() const [sensorTDS, setSensorTDS] = useState() const [sensorDO, setSensorDO] = useState() const [sensorEC, setSensorEC] = useState() const [sensorORC, setSensorORC] = useState() const [sensorTEMP, setSensorTEMP] = useState() const [sensorWC, setSensorWC] = useState() const [sensorLon, setSensorLon] = useState() const [sensorLat, setSensorLat] = useState() const handleOnClick = () => { //bagian ini untuk update const kirimRef = firebase.database().ref("realtime-db") const data = { time:sensorTime, date:sensorDate, ph:sensorPH, tds:sensorTDS, do:sensorDO, ec:sensorEC, orc:sensorORC, temp:sensorTEMP, wc:sensorWC, long:sensorLon, lat:sensorLat, } kirimRef.push(data) //======================= } return (
Input DO
Input EC
Input ORC
Input PH
Input TDS
Input Temp
Input WC
Input Latitude
Input Longitude
Input Time
Input Date
); } export default OverrideData;
